page.title: 03A FARM IN 1985.
page.content:
My friend and I were interested in farming in 1985.So we went to Manor Fa rm to ask a few questions.
Manor Farm is a farm in our village. The farmhouse was built in 1712 but he does not know how old the farm is. He has lived there for five and a half years.
The farmer has only sheep and a dog at the moment.He has 550 ewes plus lambs but sometimes he has cattle to fatten. The cattle he has are kept for beef and the sheep are for wool and lamb. He farms 295 acres but 126 acres are for wheat.
He has not had any barns rebuilt lately.He uses modern machinary for his farm.
